Blackstorm:

Blackstorm rolled to a side and fired three energy-balls against 
Maxima


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 4/27/03 12:14:06 AM Central Daylight Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > Blackestorm moved, jumped, dodged, the shots as best as she can. 
In 
> > one of those moment she was hit in her wing "AAHHHHHH"shouted 
with 
> > pain but quickly and instpie of her pain she shot three energy-
balls 
> > against Maxima.
> > 
> 
> Ducking, one energy ball barely missed the other hit her, the 
final one 
> exploded at her feet knocking her back into the wall. 
> 
> Maxima laughed, she enjoyed this spar. "Good! MORE!" her crimson 
optics 
> glowed. As she got up, eventhough she was smoldering from the 
blast, it was 
> still not enough to take her out. 
> 
> She aimed her plasma pistol again & fired more rapid rounds.
